name: sync::atomic::AtomicU8::into_inner

sync::atomic::AtomicU8: Unknown([Field(0, Ty { id: 10714, kind: RigidTy(Adt(AdtDef(DefId { id: 25997, name: "cell::UnsafeCell" }), GenericArgs([Type(Ty { id: 46, kind: RigidTy(Uint(U8)) })]))) })])

doc:
Consumes the atomic and returns the contained value.

 This is safe because passing `self` by value guarantees that no other threads are
 concurrently accessing the atomic data.

 # Examples

 ```

 assert_eq!(some_var.into_inner(), 5);
 ```
